review_blob: I would have liked to have a stronger aromatic kick for this brew. It was a refreshing IPA
beer_name: Nelson Full Nelson Organic Imperial IPA

review_blob: Nice and hoppy my kind of IPA...crucial to keep to bitterness with the aroma hops prominent. My kind of IPA!
beer_name: Lagunitas A Little Sumpin Sumpin Ale

review_blob: Enjoyed this double IPA, I would have loved to get more aroma but overall it's enjoyable.
beer_name: Sierra Nevada Beer Camp Across America West Coast Double IPA

review_blob: I just can't say enough about this craft. This experience got me to actually brew and every single year I make it a point to fly from the Philippines to the US to have my fix. Its my benchmark IPA. A true 'Magnum Opus' ! Bravo!
One of my favorite IPA's out there. This has the aroma you enjoy just before taking that first sip giving you that overall tasting experience. Bitterness is just right for an IPA.

I enjoyed the bitterness but I honestly do not think this is 100 IBU's. I've had more hop-forward craft with more intense bitterness with less IBU's. It was also lacking on the aroma front. It was there but not as intense as I would've liked.

Hi felt like this beer needed pancakes to go with it. It was just way too sweet for my taste. I had it along with 5 others and they all said the same thing. I'm not a sweet tooth so this is just not for me. I'm also surprised to not get any aroma whatsoever for an Imperial IPA. This needed to get 'hopped-up', it was too Malt centric for my taste.
